text: The year that you got People’s Sexiest Man Alive,
I don’t even know if you noticed or not,
I was the runner up.
Guys, you already know what it is.
It’s great conversation,
great wine...
I know how much you like to drink.
Me and some of Hollywood’s biggest names
are having a heart to heart
and you got a front row seat.
I’ve always sort of likened being on SNL
to this high-pressure thing,
your adrenaline goes through the roof.
I went to a New Year's Eve party,
and I pissed in their bed and flipping their mattress
and making it look like I had left
and been a good guest.
I was expecting better craft services.
Where are all the beautiful things?
And you know what I was told?
Locked up in your dressing room!
When did the light bulb click?
When you know that you've done
everything you could possibly do in your power.
Would you change any of that?
Or would you do it the same way?
You were the first real example of a
dope creative environment and I thank you.
I'm glad I wasn't wrong about you.
What if you were a disaster?
Yeah, the whole interview would’ve been s#!@
Time out! Stop!
Hart to Heart, we’ll talk about it here.
